app.logics.board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.logics.board.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoard, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyBoard, MyBoard

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBoard
    Base class that represents board logics, fire,miss,hit, ship placement. Class provides ship placement mechanism, and mechanism for tracking sectors fired at and sectors occupied by ships. Contains also specifications for different messages.
    Author:
    Artur Vitt
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
